metadata.synopsis: Justiciar that attacks Balthazar in his lair in Shar temple. Need to have same or similar voice to other Dark Justiciars

0.speaker: Justiciar Avenger
0.text: Foul assemblage! You should never have come here!
0.context: NodeContext: Rasped, wraithlike battle taunt (the subject of these taunts is himself a necromancer/possibly undead)
